title: Euro to U.S. dollar annual average exchange rate 1999 to 2019
summary: Overall Exchange rate has increased over the Year.
Exchange rate is gradually increasing from 2002 to 2004, roughly constant from 2004 to 2006, slightly increasing from 2006 to 2007, and finally roughly decreasing from 2007 to 2010.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2002 and 2003.
The highest Exchange rate, of value 1.47 was reached at Year 2008
Minimum Exchange rate about 0.95 was reached at Year 2002
